ComicInfo.Title: Esperanza's Tears
ComicInfo.Summary:
Based on the multi-million unit selling Ubisoft franchise series "Far Cry".
An official, intense new extension of the Far Cry video game lore!
Just when Juan thinks everything is finally going his way and his mission a success, the rug gets pulled out from under him. With the fate of a nation on the line, and no one he can trust, making it out alive is going to prove to be a lot trickier than he ever expected.
A prequel to the events of Far Cry 6, this amphetamine-boosted comic introduces Juan Cortez, one of the central characters in the newest installment of Ubisoft's star video game.
